patthana23.49:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.49:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.49:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.49:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
